attributes.action: Change the electoral system so a party/independent obtains one seat in the commons for every 200,000 votes received.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The voting system should change to more accurately reflect the opinions of the citizens of the UK.  One seat in the Commons for every 200,000 votes obtained at a general election to be held every 4 years.  The current Constituency MPs are to be seated in the Lords for a single term of 7 years so that the population has direct access to an MP.
